## Introduction

This project makes use of [Activity Monitoring Data] (https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2Factivity.zip) dataset. The data, which was collected using a personal activity monitoring device, includes number of steps taken at every 5 minute interval. The objective of the project is to explore the the walking behavior of related person using the dataset.
